example.name: no hearer
example.text: He did nevertheless find time *0* to do an interview with Hong Kong's Phoenix TV, [during which]-2 he discoursed freely on the subject of Macau'sdevelopment *-2.

example.name: arg 0
example.text: These additional dimensions remain wanting in the general public's discourse and among most public-health folks.
